1.name: Slain
1.desc: This operative can no longer be used. Remove it from your dataslate.

2.name: Critical Impairment
2.desc: This operative cannot perform Dash actions and its APL characteristic cannot be increased.

3.name: Severe Concussion
3.desc: This operative always suffers the penalty to the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as if it were injured.

4.name: Sapped Strength
4.desc: This operative always suffers the penalty to the Weapon Skill characteristic of its melee weapons as if it were injured.

5.name: Lingering Ailment
5.desc: This operative always suffers the penalty to its Movement characteristic as if it were injured.

6.name: Cerebral Affliction
6.desc: This operative does not gain a Battle Scar but does not gain any experience from this battle.
